answerText: Lu Xun or Lu Hsun or Zhou Shuren or Chou Shujen[10] The longest section of Lu Xun's Call to Arms is devoted to this work where the protagonist is a liar and laughingstock who executed during the Xinhai Revolution after failing to join in.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 6 | 5 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The first work in his first short story collection was named for a Gogol work. For 10 points: [10] Name this modern Chinese writer who wrote about a man who believes the people of his village, including Mr. Chao and his own elder brother are cannibals in "A Madman's Diary" from his Call to Arms.
